response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, reflecting the significant worth of the product while providing you with substantial savings compared to its market value of $1,200,000. We look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued customer.", "product_price": 950000}
